response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price tailored for you. Given its value to you, we propose to sell it to you for $14,000. This price reflects the significant benefit this product will bring to you and ensures a fair transaction for both parties. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed.", "product_price": 14000}
